document.full_text: meryl streep, amy adams and liev schreiber are among the actors who will participate in a reading on june 1 at alice tully hall of a new play written by alan alda.
document.title: meryl streep to participate in alan alda's marie curie play
lines_and_colors: meryl streep, amy adams and liev schreiber are among the actors who will participate in a reading on june 1 at alice tully hall of a new play written by alan alda.
